raw_comment:
I noticed that there is a bigger acceptance rate to these ivy league schools for students with parents that have higher income rather than students with lower. 

I wonder how many students of each income apply to these schools. 

My school offers the same education with many different income rates. 

A headline can be  "are costs the reason?‚Äù
ace_sentences: The acceptance rate at Ivy League schools is higher for students who have parents with higher income than for students who have parents with lower income.
I wonder how many students of each income apply to these schools.
My school offers the same education to students with many different income levels.
The headline is: Are costs the reason?
